about_the_game:
Zenkcraft - Colored Interface is a tool that lets you completely customize the colors with over 100 different settings across thousands of components. You can create your own personal theme, or use one of the 6 pre-made themes including Dark, Light, Albion, Midgard, Hibernia and Rainbow. You can also export your theme and share it with friends who also have Zenkcraft - Colored Interface.

The possibilities are endless. Color everything from panels, fonts, dropdowns, scroll views, input boxes, progress bars, sliders, outlines, backgrounds, and more. You can even make colors and components invisible to really change your interface!

All spellcraft features are already apart of core Zenkcraft. No spellcrafting content or templating tools are related to any downloadable content. This is a cosmetic DLC that applies only to the interface's colors.

If you spend a lot of time in Zenkcraft, then Zenkcraft - Colored Interface is a great way to make templating more enjoyable.

NOTE: This addon only works with Zenkcraft Remastered. If you are using the older version of Zenkcraft (Legacy) then this addon will not work. You must launch Zenkcraft Remastered in the launch options for this DLC to be usable.
detailed_description:
Zenkcraft - Colored Interface is a tool that lets you completely customize the colors with over 100 different settings across thousands of components. You can create your own personal theme, or use one of the 6 pre-made themes including Dark, Light, Albion, Midgard, Hibernia and Rainbow. You can also export your theme and share it with friends who also have Zenkcraft - Colored Interface.

The possibilities are endless. Color everything from panels, fonts, dropdowns, scroll views, input boxes, progress bars, sliders, outlines, backgrounds, and more. You can even make colors and components invisible to really change your interface!

All spellcraft features are already apart of core Zenkcraft. No spellcrafting content or templating tools are related to any downloadable content. This is a cosmetic DLC that applies only to the interface's colors.

If you spend a lot of time in Zenkcraft, then Zenkcraft - Colored Interface is a great way to make templating more enjoyable.

NOTE: This addon only works with Zenkcraft Remastered. If you are using the older version of Zenkcraft (Legacy) then this addon will not work. You must launch Zenkcraft Remastered in the launch options for this DLC to be usable.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: .6 GHz single core processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: uses Mono over IL2CPP
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz single core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: uses Mono over IL2CPP

name: Zenkcraft - Colored Interface

  • Processor: .6 GHz single core processor

  • Graphics: GTX 760 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz single core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Color and style your Zenkcraft interface with over 100 options and thousands of components that get colored in real-time. Use one of five pre-made themes, or create your own and share it with friends.
